hollow_hold.name: Hollow Body Hold
hollow_hold.instruction: Legs and shoulders off ground, back flat to floor. Hold full duration.

side_plank.name: Side Plank
side_plank.instruction: On forearm, stack feet, hold hips up. Hold half duration per side, then switch.

shoulder_taps.name: Plank Shoulder Taps
shoulder_taps.instruction: High plank, tap opposite shoulders. Keep hips stable. Alternate, 10 per side.

superman.name: Superman Hold
superman.instruction: Face down, lift arms+chest+legs simultaneously. Hold 3-5s, lower, repeat. 8 reps.

tricep_dips.name: Tricep Dips
tricep_dips.instruction: Hands on bench, dip down to 90Â°, push up. 12-15 reps.

renegade_row.name: Renegade Row
renegade_row.instruction: Plank with dumbbells, row one arm while stabilizing. Alternate arms, 8 per side.

plank_reach.name: Plank Reach
plank_reach.instruction: Forearm plank, extend one arm forward, hold 2s. Alternate arms, 6 per side.

bicycle_crunch.name: Bicycle Crunch
bicycle_crunch.instruction: Elbow to opposite knee, alternating. Keep lower back pressed down. 20 total (10 per side).

copen_plank.name: Copenhagen Plank
copen_plank.instruction: Side plank with top leg on bench, bottom leg hanging. Hold half duration, then switch sides.

prone_y_raise.name: Prone Y-Raise
prone_y_raise.instruction: Face down on floor or bench, raise both arms in Y shape, squeeze upper back. 10-12 reps.
